Description: Now Open! Belvoir Square is a contemporary "green" community, offering modern studio, one, and two bedroom apartments, with unique amenities and stylish finishes, such as hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, and granite countertops. Located right outside the Tulley Gate on Route 1, you'll enjoy easy access to two Metro stations, VRE, Fairfax County Parkway, 395, 495 and 95 for convenient commutes to work or play in Woodbridge, Alexandria or DC!

Description: Conveniently located minutes from the South Gate of Fort Belvoir, I-95 and US Rte.1, great shopping and restaurants in Springfield, Potomac Mills Outlet Mall, Tackett's Mill and Old Town Occoquan, Haven Fort Belvoir Apartments offers affordable luxury living in a pristine neighborhood. Manicured hedges surrounded by verdant woods sets the tone for this established community. Newly renovated interiors featuring designer touches will make your Haven Fort Belvoir residence feel like your home. Let our dedicated and professional staff provide you with royal service! For a chivalrous experience, make Haven Fort Belvoir your residence today! $500 off first month's rent for active Military!!
